DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 ROUND OF 16 ; SPOTLIGHT ; SWISS FOR A DAY
DOC.TEXT: Swiss fans Kelly Kubisiak and Darrly Chesley from Virginia won smiles wherever they went at RFK Stadium on Saturday.Kubisiak was the one wearing the 4-foot-long hat that looked_like a large piece of well-known yellow cheese . Chesley ' s had the red knife with its trademark gray cross . " We thought_of hats with chocolate , a cow and a dollar_bill . And we actually tried one that looked_like a watch -- but it was slow , " Chesley said . Neither man has spent time in Switzerland . " The Swiss happen to be playing in the only game we could get tickets for , " said Kubisiak , the hat maker . Construction time : " about one case of beer. " WILLIAM D . MONTALBANO
